DocAttribute.Name: Item
DocAttribute.Documentation: A geometric representation item to which the style is assigned. > IFC2x Edition 2 Addendum 2 CHANGE The attribute Item has been made optional. Upward compatibility for file based exchange is guaranteed.

DocAttribute.Name: Styles
DocAttribute.Documentation: Representation style assignments which are assigned to an item. NOTE: In current IFC release only one presentation style assignment shall be assigned.

DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: The word, or group of words, by which the styled item is referred to.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR11
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Restricts the number of styles to 1 (the datatype SET remains for compatibility reasons with ISO 10303-46).

DocWhereRule.Name: WR12
DocWhereRule.Documentation: A styled item cannot be styled by another styled item.
